description.en:
Virgo creates a decentralized AppStore to drive dApps adoption,
a distributed ecosystem powered by a state-of-art cryptocurrency : fast, secure and scalable. Our innovative, open-source technology doesn’t work with blocks, but a DAG; which means transactions don’t need to wait for being included by miners anymore.
Coupled with an ASIC-resistant Proof Of Work algorithm, it enables unparalleled speed, security, and reliability of transfers while remaining decentralized.
